perturbation.original_text: THIS ENDORSEMENT AGREEMENT (the "Agreement") is dated as of this ____day of ____________, 2012, but  made effective as of February 20, 2012 ("Effective Date") between Healthcare Distribution Specialists LLC ("HDS"), a  Delaware corporation, and Paul Silas ("Celebrity), an individual.
perturbation.changed_text: THIS ENDORSEMENT AGREEMENT (the "Contract") is dated as of this ____day of ____________, 2012, but  made effective as of February 20, 2012 ("Effective Date") between Healthcare Distribution Specialists LLC ("HDS"), a  Delaware corporation, and Paul Silas ("Individual"), an individual.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Agreement' to 'Contract' and 'Celebrity' to 'Individual' introduces ambiguity. While seemingly synonymous, these terms are used interchangeably without explicit definition, potentially leading to confusion regarding the scope and intent of the contract. The contract refers to Paul Silas as both 'Celebrity' and 'Individual', which creates an internal inconsistency because he is only identified as 'Celebrity' in the original definition.

perturbation.original_text: HDS shall be solely responsible for all liability arising out of production, distribution and sale of its product. HDS hereby agrees to indemnify, defend and hold harmless Celebrity, his agents, representatives and employees  (referred to collectively as "Celebrity Indemnities")  from and against any and all claims, actions, causes or action,  damages, injuries, expenses, liabilities (joint and several), penalties fines, attorneys fees, court costs, and any other  expenses incurred by Celebrity Indemnities arising out of (1) breach by HDS of any of the terms, representations or  warranties made by HDS in this Agreement; or (2) HDS product liability or trademark patent or other proprietary right  infringement; or (3) errors, omissions, fraudulent or negligent acts by HDS, its employees, agents or subcontractors in  connection with (i) any advertising featuring Celebrity; (ii) with the performance of HDS' duties and obligations under  this Agreement; (iii) with the production, distribution, promotion, marketing and sales of products including related  product packaging; and/or (iv) with the operation and management of its production and distribution facilities,  however caused, HDS shall not be obligated to indemnify Celebrity with respect to damages which are the result of the  active negligence or willful misconduct of Celebrity.
perturbation.changed_text: HDS shall be solely responsible for all liability arising out of production, distribution and sale of its product. HDS hereby agrees to indemnify, defend and hold harmless Paul Silas, his agents, representatives and employees (referred to collectively as "Silas Indemnities") from and against any and all claims, actions, causes or action, damages, injuries, expenses, liabilities (joint and several), penalties fines, attorneys fees, court costs, and any other expenses incurred by Silas Indemnities arising out of (1) breach by HDS of any of the terms, representations or warranties made by HDS in this Agreement; or (2) HDS product liability or trademark patent or other proprietary right infringement; or (3) errors, omissions, fraudulent or negligent acts by HDS, its employees, agents or subcontractors in connection with (i) any advertising featuring Individual; (ii) with the performance of HDS' duties and obligations under this Agreement; (iii) with the production, distribution, promotion, marketing and sales of products including related product packaging; and/or (iv) with the operation and management of its production and distribution facilities, however caused, HDS shall not be obligated to indemnify Paul Silas with respect to damages which are the result of the active negligence or willful misconduct of Paul Silas.
perturbation.explanation: Here, 'Celebrity Indemnities' is changed to 'Silas Indemnities' in the first part of the section, and then the text uses 'Individual' and 'Paul Silas' later on. If Paul Silas is an 'Individual' as defined earlier, does that change the obligations? Are 'Celebrity Indemnities' and 'Silas Indemnities' intended to be the same? These terms are never reconciled, which makes the contract internally inconsistent.

perturbation.original_text: All HDS' uses of Celebrity Attributes in connection with the  Commercial and/or press releases shall be subject to the prior written approval of Celebrity via his agent, CSE. Said  written approval must be given within five (5) business days of CSE's receipt or said usage shall be deemed  unapproved. Any such usage featuring Celebrity in the Commercial and/or press releases shall be and remain the  property of HDS; however, HDS shall have the right to use said Commercial and/or press releases solely as outlined in  Paragraph 3 and only during the Term. Celebrity may use said materials in whole or in part solely for the purpose of  presenting Celebrity's work in Celebrity's personal portfolio, website or otherwise and/or on Celebrity's agent's  website. Such usage may not be sold or transferred.
perturbation.changed_text: All HDS' uses of Paul Silas' Attributes in connection with the  Commercial and/or press releases shall be subject to the prior written approval of Individual via his agent, CSE. Said  written approval must be given within five (5) business days of CSE's receipt or said usage shall be deemed  unapproved. Any such usage featuring Celebrity in the Commercial and/or press releases shall be and remain the  property of HDS; however, HDS shall have the right to use said Commercial and/or press releases solely as outlined in  Paragraph 3 and only during the Term. Celebrity may use said materials in whole or in part solely for the purpose of  presenting Individual's work in Individual's personal portfolio, website or otherwise and/or on Celebrity's agent's  website. Such usage may not be sold or transferred.
perturbation.explanation: The terms "Celebrity Attributes", "Paul Silas' Attributes", and "Individual's work" are used in close proximity, but it isn't clear if they are referring to the same thing in this section. If they are, there should be a consistent term. Also, given that the term 'Celebrity' has already been used, it's very hard to determine what Attributes actually belong to that person. Does that mean anything they do as a public figure?
